Package Model

Class MusicPlayerModel

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
Model.MusicPlayerModel
public class MusicPlayerModel extends Observable
Author:
Dhruv Bhatia, Muhtasim Al-Farabi, Shrey Goyal, Suryashree Ray This class contains the model for the music player. It contains all the necessary information about the musics and the media player and also handles the state of music player. It uses some Javafx objects like media and media player that we use to play the music. It can play and pause songs using the playSong() and pauseSongs() method, and can simulate a music player.

  • Constructor Details

    • MusicPlayerModel

      public MusicPlayerModel() throws IOException
      Constructor

      This is the constructor for the model. It initializes the model, the audio files arraylist, initial audio, audioplayer, the first metadata and also creates the favorites.txt if it doesn't exist already.

      Throws:
      IOException - happens when the user input in wrong

  • Method Details

    • playSong

      public void playSong()
      Plays the song

      This method plays the current song and also makes sure to get the new audio if we are going to another song. It notifies the observers of the change.

    • pauseSong

      public void pauseSong()
      Pauses the song.

      This method pauses the current song that we are playing.

    • nextSong

      public void nextSong()
      Goes to the next song in the library

      This method helps us to go to the next song in the library and also account for if we have played the total playlist or not.

    • previousSong

      public void previousSong()
      Goes to the previous song in the library

      This method helps us to go to the previous song in the library and also account for if we have played the first song or not.

    • shuffleSongs

      public void shuffleSongs()
      Shuffles the song library

      This method shuffles all the song in the library and will have a new library

    • addFavSong

      public boolean addFavSong​(String name) throws IOException
      Adds song to our favorite file

      This function helps to add favorite songs into our file and uses the Filewiter to do that.

      Parameters:
      name - is a string with the name of the song to be added to our favorites
      Returns:
      true if the favorite is added and false if the favorite is not added.
      Throws:
      IOException - happens when the user input in wrong

    • removeFavSongsFromFile

      public void removeFavSongsFromFile​(String name) throws IOException

      Parameters:
      name - is a string with the name of the song to be removed to our favorites
      Throws:
      IOException - happens when the user input in wrong
